    #include <iostream>
    #include <cstdio>
    using namespace std;
     
    int main() {
    	// your code goes here
    	int tc;
    	scanf("%d", &tc);
     
    	while (tc--)
    	{
    		int n;
    		scanf("%d", &n);
    		int a[n];
     
    		int tot = 0;
    		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    		{
    			scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    			tot += a[i];
    		}
     
    		if (tot % n != 0)
    		{
    			printf("-1\n");
    			continue;
    		}
     
    		int remove = 0;
    		int k = tot / n;
    		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
    			if (a[i] > k)
    				remove += (a[i] - k);
     
    		printf("%d\n", 2*remove);
     
     
    	}
     
    	return 0;
    }
